name: TeleMirror
description: App helps mirroring newly created post from Telegram channels.

SOURCE_CHATS.description: Comma-separated list of source chats (with their IDs (-100...)). Example: -100source1,-100source2

TARGET_CHANNEL.description: Target channel with linked chat (comments enabled). Example: -100target1

KEYWORD_REPLACE_ENABLE.description: Enable keywords replacing (true or false). Defaults to true

KEYWORD_REPLACE_MAP.description: Comma-separated list keywords to replace. Example: cat:dog,one:two

BOTTOM_LINK_ENABLE.description: Enable bottom link to original post (true or false). Defaults to true

BOTTOM_LINK_DISPLAY_NAME.description: Bottom link display name. Defaults to Link

DISABLE_DELETE.description: Disable mirror message deleting (true or false). Defaults to false

DISABLE_EDIT.description: Disable mirror message editing (true or false). Defaults to false

USE_MEMORY_DB.description: Use an in-memory database instead of Postgres DB (true or false). Defaults to false

LOG_LEVEL.description: Logging level (debug, info, warning, error or critical). Defaults to info
